altername_name: Katekyoo Hitman Reborn! DS: Flame Rumble: Kaien Ring Soudatsusen!
name: Katekyoo Hitman Reborn! DS Flame Rumble Kaien Ring Soudatsuen!
overview: Katekyoo Hitman Reborn! DS Flame Rumble Kaien Ring Soudatsuen! is an Action game, developed and published by Takara Tomy, which was released in Japan in 2007.
